answers.answer: Are you aware Pred Forte's main ingredient is prednisolone, which is a corticosteroid [not be confused with Anabolic steroids], and it may/does raise glucose levels? Did you discuss the length of usage with the eye surgeon and also inform him/her you are diabetic? Depending on length your elevated morning glucose may be short lived. You might consider discussing with your Pharmacist an alternative eye drop that doesn't affect your glucose levels, then call your physician.
Thanks, yes am aware of all those comments. Have about 2 more weeks before things get back to normal.biochemiker
Keep a watchful eye on your glucose levels throughout the day. Go to ER if you feel uneasy. Hope "things get back to normal."
